name: Instable Endless
description:
Game made for Solo Game Dev class

An endless runner version of the 2D-Platformer game, Instable, that I previously made. 

You play as an unstable character sprite whose abilities are determined by the color it changes to.  Only two colors so far. Blue for jump, yellow for dash.

Music: Eric Skiff - Prolouge - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music

CONTROLS

SPACE - Jump/Dash depending on color

ESC - To close game

RETURN - Go back to start screen

Main Game is currently outfitted for high-resolution displays

Got asked about low-res option so I included a low-resolution friendly option where you should now see the score if you have a low-res monitor.
